docs.snippet: Spain striker Diego Costa has refuted Brazil coach Luiz Felipe Scolari's claims that he contacted him over playing the World Cup for the host nation....
docs.lead_paragraph: Spain striker Diego Costa has refuted Brazil coach Luiz Felipe Scolari's claims that he contacted him over playing the World Cup for the host nation.

headline.main: Costa Denies He Was Offered World Cup Chance With Brazil
headline.print_headline: Costa Denies He Was Offered World Cup Chance With Brazil

docs.snippet: An antitrust trial begins Monday that could upend big-time college sports....
docs.lead_paragraph: An antitrust trial begins Monday that could upend big-time college sports.
docs.abstract: Joe Nocera Op-Ed column holds that antitrust lawsuit being filed by former UCLA basketball star Ed O'Bannon against the NCAA may force association to change culture in which adult coaches get rich at expense of college players; says that while few believe that NCAA protects interests of young athletes, only Congress or courts can force it to change.

docs.snippet: Germany attacking midfielder Marco Reus was ruled out of the World Cup on Saturday with an ankle injury sustained in a 6-1 friendly win over Armenia....
docs.lead_paragraph: Germany attacking midfielder Marco Reus was ruled out of the World Cup on Saturday with an ankle injury sustained in a 6-1 friendly win over Armenia.

headline.main: Reus Ruled Out of World Cup for Germany
headline.print_headline: Reus Ruled Out of World Cup for Germany

docs.snippet: Vietnamese and Philippine naval forces planned to play football, volleyball and tug-of-war Sunday in the first such display of camaraderie in the Spratly Islands in the South China sea where territorial rifts with China have flared....

docs.snippet: Bringing the world together, one soccer match at a time....
docs.lead_paragraph: Bringing the world together, one soccer match at a time.
docs.abstract: Pamela Druckerman Op-Ed article describes how enamored with soccer her young children have become in advance of the World Cup; contends best part about international match is the simple joy it gives people, and the way it makes the world a slightly happier place.
